name: Linked-list
body:
Welcome to the Linked.php!

### Author: Dan Huckson
###  Email: DanHuckson@gmail.com
 
### Date: 2013/12/26
### Double linked list class in php.
![Double Linked List in PHP](http://www.dyncomp.net/images/linked-list.jpg)
## Node Methods:
id(), is_first(), is_last(), is_zombie(), insert_before(), 
insert_after(), replace(), remove().

## List Methods: 
init(), add_head(), add_tail(), before(), after(), remove(), index_of(),
size(), first(), last(), is_first(), is_last(), is_empty(), has_node(), get_node(), swap(),
replace(), walk(), dump().
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
